com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
Class TextBoxBase

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.VisibleComponent
      com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidViewComponent
          com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.TextBoxBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener, Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmailPicker, PasswordTextBox, TextBox
public abstract class TextBoxBase
extends AndroidViewComponent
implements android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener

Underlying base class for TextBox, not directly accessible to Simple programmers.

Author:
sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl)

GotFocus

public void GotFocus()
Event raised when this component is selected for input, such as by the user touching it.

LostFocus

public void LostFocus()
Event raised when this component is no longer selected for input, such as if the user touches a different text box.

TextAlignment

public int TextAlignment()
Returns the alignment of the textbox's text: center, normal (e.g., left-justified if text is written left to right), or opposite (e.g., right-justified if text is written left to right).

Returns:
one of Component.ALIGNMENT_NORMAL, Component.ALIGNMENT_CENTER or Component.ALIGNMENT_OPPOSITE

TextAlignment

public void TextAlignment(int alignment)
Specifies the alignment of the textbox's text: center, normal (e.g., left-justified if text is written left to right), or opposite (e.g., right-justified if text is written left to right).

Parameters:
alignment - one of Component.ALIGNMENT_NORMAL, Component.ALIGNMENT_CENTER or Component.ALIGNMENT_OPPOSITE

Returns:
background RGB color with alpha

Enabled

public boolean Enabled()
Returns true if the textbox is active and useable.

Returns:
true indicates enabled, false disabled

Enabled

public void Enabled(boolean enabled)
Specifies whether the textbox should be active and useable.

Parameters:
enabled - true for enabled, false disabled

FontBold

public boolean FontBold()
Returns true if the textbox's text should be bold. If bold has been requested, this property will return true, even if the font does not support bold.

Returns:
true indicates bold, false normal

FontBold

public void FontBold(boolean bold)
Specifies whether the textbox's text should be bold. Some fonts do not support bold.

Parameters:
bold - true indicates bold, false normal

FontItalic

public boolean FontItalic()
Returns true if the textbox's text should be italic. If italic has been requested, this property will return true, even if the font does not support italic.

Returns:
true indicates italic, false normal

FontItalic

public void FontItalic(boolean italic)
Specifies whether the textbox's text should be italic. Some fonts do not support italic.

Parameters:
italic - true indicates italic, false normal

FontSize

public float FontSize()
Returns the textbox's text's font size, measured in pixels.

Returns:
font size in pixel

FontSize

public void FontSize(float size)
Specifies the textbox's text's font size, measured in pixels.

Parameters:
size - font size in pixel

FontTypeface

public int FontTypeface()
Returns the textbox's text's font face as default, serif, sans serif, or monospace.

Returns:
one of Component.TYPEFACE_DEFAULT, Component.TYPEFACE_SERIF, Component.TYPEFACE_SANSSERIF or Component.TYPEFACE_MONOSPACE

FontTypeface

public void FontTypeface(int typeface)
Specifies the textbox's text's font face as default, serif, sans serif, or monospace.

Parameters:
typeface - one of Component.TYPEFACE_DEFAULT, Component.TYPEFACE_SERIF, Component.TYPEFACE_SANSSERIF or Component.TYPEFACE_MONOSPACE
